view.title: Adversary attempts demand/hold abuse
view.subtitle: Repeated unauthorized hold attempts were blocked (403).

blocks.title: Adversary Hold Abuse completed
blocks.message: Repeated unauthorized hold attempts were blocked (403).

resultPayload.note: Repeated unauthorized hold attempts were blocked (403).

requestBody.title: Biz member reviews and updates booking status API Trace

data.instruction: Invite a biz member, assign an operational role, and verify that member can authenticate into the same biz.
data.expectedResult: Biz member account/session exists with scoped role permissions.

data.instruction: Using credentials from another context, attempt to read or mutate booking/order resources for this biz.
data.expectedResult: Request is rejected with forbidden/unauthorized error and no data leakage.

data.instruction: Create a published offer version with realistic duration and base price for this UC.
data.expectedResult: Offer version exists and is ready for booking order references.

data.title: Biz member reviews and updates booking status API Trace

data.instruction: Create customer account/session and verify customer can browse published offers.
data.expectedResult: Customer session established and offer discovery succeeds.
